sentences.sentence: His writings reveal an unattractive preciousness of style.
sentences.translation: 他的文章流露出不讨好的做作风格。

sentences.sentence: The building reveals its preciousness at first sight.
sentences.translation: 建筑具有让人一见钟情的可贵品质。

sentences.sentence: Only when we witness death will we recognize the preciousness of life.
sentences.translation: 只有见证了死亡，我们才会真正认识到生命的可贵。
